mobileResponsivenessTip: Optimize images for mobile to reduce loading times and improve overall performance on smaller screens.
loadingSpeedTip: Implement lazy loading for images and defer non-essential scripts to improve page load time.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve meta descriptions and include more localized keywords to enhance search visibility.
userExperienceTip: Enhance the navigation menu by adding more prominent calls to action for better user guidance.
bookingFlowTip: Simplify the booking form by reducing unnecessary fields and making the steps more intuitive.
